entry.title: Welcome To Our New Lab Members!

link.title: Welcome To Our New Lab Members!

entry.content: We would like to thank the NIH BRAIN Initiative for supporting our research with R00 Pathway to Independence Award!
entry.summary: We would like to thank the NIH BRAIN Initiative for supporting our research with R00 Pathway to Independence Award!

entry.title: Welcome To Our New Lab Members!

link.title: Welcome To Our New Lab Members!

entry.content: We are excited to welcome four new lab members that have joined us with the new semester! Junhao and Nida have joined the INSPIRE Lab as PhD students in Artificial Intelligence and Bioengineering, respectively. Catherine (Biocomputational Engineering) and Nurahmed (Computer Engineering) have joined the lab as undergraduate researchers. We look forward to working with them!
entry.summary: We are excited to welcome four new lab members that have joined us with the new semester! Junhao and Nida have joined the INSPIRE Lab as PhD students in Artificial Intelligence and Bioengineering, respectively. Catherine (Biocomputational Engineering) and Nurahmed (Computer Engineering) have joined the lab as undergraduate researchers. We look forward to working with them!

entry.title: Welcome to Our New Postdoc Researchers!

link.title: Welcome to Our New Postdoc Researchers!

entry.content: We are pleased to welcome Dr. Linnea Hoheisel and Dr. Jianan Jian to our lab as postdoctoral researchers. Linnea’s work focuses on brain network dynamics, while Jianan is interested in exploring brain connectivity through neuroimaging techniques.
entry.summary: We are pleased to welcome Dr. Linnea Hoheisel and Dr. Jianan Jian to our lab as postdoctoral researchers. Linnea’s work focuses on brain network dynamics, while Jianan is interested in exploring brain connectivity through neuroimaging techniques.

entry.title: Welcome New Lab Members!
entry.content: We are excited to welcome the first cohort of lab members joining us! Mike (Physiology and Neurobiology, Psychology) is our new lab manager, Nirmal (Computer Science, Mathematics) is our new research technician, and Olaniyi (Computer Science, Mathematics), Matthew (Computer Science), Ben (Computer Science), and Archana (Psychology, Criminology & Criminal Justice) are our new undergraduate researchers. We look forward to achieving great things together!
entry.summary: We are excited to welcome the first cohort of lab members joining us! We look forward to achieving great things together!

entry.title: HELLO WORLD!
entry.content: INSPIRE Lab is launching at UMD College Park! We have multiple openings for motivated young minds!
entry.summary: INSPIRE Lab is launching at UMD College Park! We have multiple openings for motivated young minds!
